description.summary:
Class Error contains information about an error returned from the request:
ErrorCode:
Momento.Sdk.Exceptions.MomentoErrorCode value for the error.
Message:
A detailed error message.

prop.name: ErrorCode
InnerException
prop.summary: The SdkException object used to construct the response.

prop.name: Message
prop.summary: An explanation of conditions that caused and potential ways to resolve the error.

description.summary: Class Success indicates that the request that generated it was successful.
